StudyItemDrawer.title: Create Study Item
StudyItemDrawer.description: Fill in the details to create a new study item. Add a title, description, and select relevant tags to organize your item.
StudyItemDrawer.progressDescription: Track the stages and status of repetitions for effective memorization.

TagDrawer.title: Create new tag
TagDrawer.description: Enter a name and description for the new tag to organize your study items.

StudyItemForm.descriptionPlaceholder: For example, 'Formula for finding the hypotenuse'

TagForm.colorPlaceholder: Choose a color for the tag
